alert.note: Alert for Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 10:47AM CDT until June 12 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN POTTER AND SOUTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 1046 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Masterson, or 15 miles south of Dumas, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Masterson, Four Way and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
